title: Contributing to labeleR
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven‚Äôt done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("EcologyR/labeleR", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn‚Äôt pass cleanly, ‚Äôs good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e.¬†just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to labeleR

Function configure_email() drive step step whole process, prefer manually, go : https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords create app using gmail account. Warning! Please bear mind gmail account use one sending emails, thus visible recipients. accessed, create app (name visible!), given password. Save somewhere safe, asked time use feature. mailing application, configure structure want use mailing distribution (.e.¬†subject, body, cc bcc wish). configure , just run configure_email(user = "youruser@gmail.com", app.name = "yourapp") , user gmail account previously used, app.name application name already created. Remember password , asked . Great! Now can send emails soon rendered. Just remember specify column data frame storing recipient email address email.column created configuration object (, myemail) email.info slot. Just precaution, labeleR ask sure want send , , just click ‚ÄúYes‚Äù sent soon rendered! Amazing! just like magic! (G. Lockhart). example recipient receive mail:

title: Create Book of Abstracts ‚Äî create_abstractbook
text: data data frame including titles, author names, affiliations abstracts. path Character. Path folder PDF file saved. filename Character. Filename pdf. NULL, default "AbstractBook". title.column Character. Name column data storing abstracts' titles. authors.column Character. Name column data storing authors' names affiliations. Numeric (symbol, e.g. '*') affiliations MUST specified brackets. Authors must separated using semi-colon (';'). affiliation.column Character. Name column data storing addresses affiliation number (specified brackets author names, authors.column). Separations authors must specified using semi-colon (';'). text.column Name column data storing abstract text. frontpage Character. Path PDF file inserted book abstracts (front page /introduction). toc Logical. TRUE, Table Contents included. toc.title Character. Title name Table Contents. Default "Index". title.cex Text font size used title. Default 22. authors.cex Text font size used authors' names. Default 16. affiliations.cex Text font size used affiliation addresses Default 14. text.cex Text font size used abstract main text body. Default 14. font Character. Font face use. Default Latin Modern. NOTE: fonts supported, unexpected results may occur. list fonts available https://tug.org/FontCatalogue/opentypefonts.html. See Details information. keep.files Logical. Keep RMarkdown template associated files output folder? Default FALSE. template Character (optional) RMarkdown template use. provided, using default template included labeleR.

title: Create herbarium labels ‚Äî create_herbarium_label
text: Create herbarium labels (4 labels per DIN-A4 page)

title: Create herbarium labels ‚Äî create_herbarium_label
code: create_herbarium_label(   data = data,   path = NULL,   filename = NULL,   title = NULL,   subtitle = NULL,   qr = NULL,   family.column = NULL,   taxon.column = NULL,   author.column = NULL,   det.column = NULL,   date.det.column = NULL,   location.column = NULL,   area.description.column = NULL,   latitude.column = NULL,   longitude.column = NULL,   elevation.column = NULL,   field1.column = NULL,   field2.column = NULL,   field3.column = NULL,   collector.column = NULL,   collection.column = NULL,   assistants.column = NULL,   date.column = NULL,   font = NULL,   keep.files = FALSE,   template = NULL )

title: Create herbarium labels ‚Äî create_herbarium_label
text: data data frame. row contains information species appear label. path Character. Path folder PDF file saved. filename Character. Filename pdf. NULL, default "Herbarium". title Main title top labels. Can blank set NULL. subtitle Subtitle bottom labels. Can blank set NULL. qr String. Free text column data specifies link QR code. specified value qr column name data, QRs equal, pointing link. family.column Character (optional). Name column data storing family taxon. taxon.column Character (optional). Name column data storing taxon name. author.column Character (optional). Name column data storing taxon author. det.column Character (optional). Name column data storing determiner voucher. date.det.column Character (optional). Name column data storing date voucher determined. location.column Character (optional). Name column data storing voucher collected. area.description.column Character (optional). Name column data storing description area. latitude.column Character (optional). Name column data storing latitude specimen collected. longitude.column Character (optional). Name column data storing longitude specimen collected. elevation.column Character (optional). Name column data storing elevation specimen collected. field1.column Character (optional). Name column data storing first free text appear top label. field2.column Character (optional). Name column data storing second free text appear field1. field3.column Character (optional). Name column data storing second free text appear field2. collector.column Character (optional). Name column data storing name collector. collection.column Character (optional). Name column data storing voucher's collection number. assistants.column Character (optional). Name column data storing names collector's assistants. date.column Character (optional). Name column data storing date specimen collected. font Character. Font face use. Default Latin Modern. NOTE: fonts supported, unexpected results may occur. list fonts available https://tug.org/FontCatalogue/opentypefonts.html. See Details information. keep.files Logical. Keep RMarkdown template associated files output folder? Default FALSE. template Character (optional) RMarkdown template use. provided, using default template included labeleR.

title: Create herbarium labels ‚Äî create_herbarium_label
text: pdf file four herbarium labels per page within 'output' folder.

title: Create herbarium labels ‚Äî create_herbarium_label
text: font fonts can used. Consider stated 'Part TeX Live', OTF TT available. Additionally, fonts whose 'Usage' differs \normalfont, \itshape \bfseries usually fail installation /rendering. Several fonts tried seem work : libertinus accanthis Alegreya algolrevived almendra antpolt Archivo Baskervaldx bitter tgbonum caladea librecaslon tgchorus cyklop forum imfellEnglish LobsterTwo quattrocento

title: Create multichoice exam ‚Äî create_multichoice
text: Creates multichoice exam, 4 questions per page (first one title plus 3 questions).

title: Create multichoice exam ‚Äî create_multichoice
code: create_multichoice(   data = NULL,   path = NULL,   filename = NULL,   title = NULL,   question.column = NULL,   option1.column = NULL,   option2.column = NULL,   option3.column = NULL,   option4.column = NULL,   image.column = NULL,   solutions = F,   start = 1,   seeds = NULL,   frontpage = NULL,   font = NULL,   keep.files = FALSE,   template = NULL )

title: Create multichoice exam ‚Äî create_multichoice
text: data data frame including questions choices, may include column adjacent image paths. path Character. Path folder PDF file saved. filename Character. Filename pdf. NULL, default "multichoice". title Title exam. different models rendered, shown . question.column Character. Name column data storing question shown. option1.column Character. Name column data storing CORRECT answer. always appear first place; options randomly sorted. option2.column Character. Name column data storing second choice (INCORRECT). option3.column Character (optional 2 choice questions). Name column data storing third choice (INCORRECT). option4.column Character (optional 3 choice questions). Name column data storing fourth choice (INCORRECT). image.column Character (optional). Name column containing file paths image may appear side question. solutions Logical. Whether PDF solutions rendered. start Numeric. Number first question (useful exams split several parts). seeds Numeric vector undefined length. Seeds randomize question order choice order. length seeds longer one, multiple choice exam rendered ONE specified. frontpage Character (optional). Path PDF file inserted document (front page /instructions). font Character. Font face use. Default Latin Modern. NOTE: fonts supported, unexpected results may occur. list fonts available https://tug.org/FontCatalogue/opentypefonts.html. See Details information. keep.files Logical. Keep RMarkdown template associated files output folder? Default FALSE. template Character (optional) RMarkdown template use. provided, using default template included labeleR.

title: Create multichoice exam ‚Äî create_multichoice
text: PDF file saved disk, folder defined path. keep.files = TRUE, RMarkdown file also appear folder.

title: Create multichoice exam ‚Äî create_multichoice
text: font fonts can used. Consider stated 'Part TeX Live', OTF TT available. Additionally, fonts whose 'Usage' differs \normalfont, \itshape \bfseries usually fail installation /rendering. Several fonts tried seem work : libertinus accanthis Alegreya algolrevived almendra antpolt Archivo Baskervaldx bitter tgbonum caladea librecaslon tgchorus cyklop forum imfellEnglish LobsterTwo quattrocento

title: Create certificate of participation ‚Äî create_participation_certificate

title: Create certificate of participation ‚Äî create_participation_certificate
code: create_participation_certificate(   data = NULL,   path = NULL,   filename = NULL,   language = c("English", "Spanish"),   name.column = NULL,   affiliation.column = "",   comm.type.column = "",   title.column = "",   coauthor.column = "",   date.column = "",   email.column = NULL,   email.info = NULL,   type = "",   event = "",   freetext = "",   signer = "",   signer.role = "",   signature.pic = NULL,   lpic = NULL,   rpic = NULL,   font = NULL,   keep.files = FALSE,   template = NULL )

title: Create certificate of participation ‚Äî create_participation_certificate
text: data data frame containing participants' names contributions. path path Character. Path folder PDF certificates saved. filename Character. Filename pdf. NULL, default "Participation" English, "Participacion" Spanish". language Character. Select 'English' 'Spanish'. name.column Character. Name column data storing participants' name. affiliation.column Character (optional). Name column data storing participants' affiliation comm.type.column Character. Name column data reporting participation type (e.g. poster, oral communication, etc) title.column Character. Name column data storing title contribution. coauthor.column Name column data storing names coauthors contribution. date.column Character. Name column data storing dates participation. email.column Character. Name column data storing attendees' email address automatically send certificates. email.info Object created using configure_email() function. type Character (optional). Type event (conference, workshop, seminar...) event Character. Title event freetext Character (optional). Free text insert date. Can include LaTeX commands (see examples). signer Character. Person signs certificate signer.role Character. Signer's role position signature.pic Character (optional) Path PNG image appear bottom, signer's name. lpic Character (optional) Path PNG image appear top-left. rpic Character (optional) Path PNG image appear top-right. font Character. Font face use. Default Latin Modern. NOTE: fonts supported, unexpected results may occur. list fonts available https://tug.org/FontCatalogue/opentypefonts.html. See Details information. keep.files Logical. Keep RMarkdown template associated files output folder? Default FALSE. template Character (optional) RMarkdown template use. provided, using default template included labeleR.

Automate production potentially large numbers herbarium collection labels, accreditation badges, attendance participation certificates, etc, deliver automatically.
